metadata.title: Pakistan, Sweden reaffirm commitment to further strengthen bilateral ties

content.article_body: ISLAMABAD, Jul 02 (APP): Pakistan and Sweden have reaffirmed their commitment to further strengthen cooperation in key areas, including the green transition, digitisation, sustainable technologies, and ICT. The commitment was reiterated during the 19th round of bilateral political consultations between Pakistan and Sweden, which was held in Sweden on Tuesday (July 1), said a press release issued here on Wednesday.Ambassador Muhammad Ayub, Additional Secretary (Europe), led the Pakistani delegation while Ambassador Mikael Lindvall headed the Swedish side.The two sides discussed the full spectrum of bilateral relations. Views were also exchanged on regional and global issues.
